allow: Bash(find Assets/Materials -maxdepth 1 -name "*.meta" -exec sh -c 'basename=$(basename ""$1"" .meta); [ -f ""Assets/Materials/Gems/$basename"" ] && mv ""$1"" ""Assets/Materials/Gems/"" || [ -f ""Assets/Materials/DesertVillage/$basename"" ] && mv ""$1"" ""Assets/Materials/DesertVillage/"" || true' _ {} ;)
